name: Al-Azan
0:
”Alexa start al azan”
”Alexa play al azan”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: al azan
des:
This skill plays the Azan with a simple voice command. Simply say "Alexa, start Al-Azan." or you can make a routine to play the Azan at a specific time or at sunset.

Don't forget to enable our skill for the Fajr Azan!
https://www.amazon.com/AyeZye-Fajr-Azan/dp/B08G523182/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
